full_description:
KOSPET TANK T2 MIL-STD Rugged Waterproof Smartwatch

The KOSPET TANK T2 is a MIL-STD Rugged Smartwatch ready for adventure. It is an innovative smartwatch that features a 1.43" AMOLED Full Touch screen display. It is equipped with an RTL8763EW CPU and 128M ROM. The smartwatch features Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity and it is compatible with Android 5.1 & IOS 10.0 and above. A 410mAh Pure Cobalt Battery powers the KOSPET TANK T2 and it can offer a long battery life.

Embrace Brilliance on AMOLED & Retina Display

TANK T2 features an AMOLED screen that shows every detail clearly, even in intense outdoor lighting. The self-luminescent materials ensure optimal visibility. Additionally, the always-on time display, made possible by the energy-efficient AMOLED technology, allows you to stay informed at all times.

Bluetooth Calling with HIFI Audio Quality

TANK T2 utilizes the latest RealTek single-chip processor 8763EW with dual-mode Bluetooth. Connect the app to make phone calls and play music from your wrist. With a built-in audio decoding chip, it delivers impressive sound quality, from deep bass to clear medium pitch.

24/7 Heart Rate Monitor & Blood Oxygen Measurement

The KOSPET TANK T2 Smartwatch is equipped with a cutting-edge BioTracker tracking optical sensor and it supports automatic detection for both static and dynamic heart rates day and night. It can also monitor your blood saturation on-demand during workouts to guard you against any injury contributed by excessive exercise.

5ATM & IP69K Waterproof

The KOSPET TANK T2 Smartwatch comes with a 5ATM & IP69K water-resistant design. It can cover both water and underwater sports daily. The watch can be exposed to pressurized or high-velocity water, such as when showering, surfing, swimming, diving, etc.

Passed through 12 MIL-STD Military Tests

The TANK T2 has nailed up to a dozen MIL-STD Military Tests. This rugged smartwatch can withstand any harsh condition and it can work even under extreme-temp ( -40℃ ~ 70℃ ). Plus it also has 70 Sports Modes with Smart Recognition for you. It is a perfect adventure companion.

Ultra-long Battery Life

The KOSPET TANK T2 is powered by a 410mAh pure cobalt battery with high capacity and voltage. It adopts a double-mode, single-chip processor to minimize power consumption. Enabled by our extraordinary software algorithms, the smartwatch ensures long-lasting battery life, 65-day standby time and 25 days for daily usage.

full_description:
Kospet Tank M3 Ultra Rugged Waterproof Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch

The Kospet Tank M3 Ultra is a feature-packed smartwatch that focuses on both strong durability and seamless performance. This majestic smartwatch features with 1.96” AMOLED screen with a sturdy stainless steel unibody and Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protects the screen from scratches. The Smartwatch Kospet Tank M3 Ultra is built with an ATS3085L chip and memory of 256M NOR. Whether you are trekking hills, or navigating city streets, the Kospet Tank M3 Ultra is dedicated to offering a smooth, responsive user experience. Kospet Tank M3 Ultra The smartwatch has 480 mAh which provides huge battery life In performance. VP60 bio-tracking sensor helps you find the highly accurate heart rate, blood oxygen, and stress levels. Moreover, when you are sleeping, the smartwatch monitors your sleep quality too. The smartwatch gives you GPS accuracy as it picks up both L1 and L5 signals.

1.96” AMOLED Display

The Kospet Tank M3 Ultra is featured with a majestic 1.96” AMOLED display which can produce 331 ppi or 410 × 502 pixels resolution. The resolution gives you an immersive viewing experience that is full of clarity and vividness. The smartwatch ensures excellent visibility in bright sunlight.

The Sturdy Structure of Kospet Tank M3 Ultra

The combination of stainless steel unibody, Corning Gorilla Glass 3, and proof Polyamide has given the smartwatch a robust structure. The steel unibody brings strength. The Corning Gorilla Glass 3 has made the smartwatch released from scratch. The strong combination of the Kospet Tank M3 Ultra has brought great adaptability to every situation.

5 ATM & IP69K (Dive-proof) Water-resistance

There is no worry for you if you use the Kospet tank M3 Ultra on a rainy day. The smartwatch is 5 ATM and IP69 water-resistant. So, you can dive into the swimming pool without any hesitation. The smartwatch can withstand pressure up to 50 meters under the water.

15 MIL-STD-810H Certifications & 28 Reliable Internal Tests

Kospet Tank M3 Ultra is 15MIL-STD_810H certified. The certification is developed by the U. S. Department of Defense, The testing examines the equipment’s resistance to the environmental conditions the equipment may face throughout its lifetime. The certification ensures the durability and reliability that lead to longevity and increase the sustainability of the equipment. Kospet Tank M3 Ultra will provide longevous and sustainable support.

Dual-band GPS & 6 Satellite Positioning Systems

The Kospet Tank M3 Ultra uses both L1 and L5 positioning, which helps provide broad coverage and penetrating obstacles with higher accuracy and reliability in terms of accurate tracking. So, you will get more precise location information during outdoor activities like hiking, running, or cycling. The smartwatch supports six different satellite positioning systems, including GPS, Galileo, GLONASS, BeiDou, QZSS, and NAVIC (IRNSS), which help to cope with complex environments.
